name: YouTube Redesign V2 (2021)
description: This is the first Version of my Redesign.
additional_info:
If you have wishes for the next Version, write it in the comments.

Redesigns:

v2

• Microphone in the searchbar
• [before login] rounded subscribe button
• [before login] subscribe button hover [message: Log to sub]
• rounded/improved more windows/menus [UI].
• redesigned the Autoplay 2 [the first version is also remained]

v1.9:
• Added animation on the start drawer (on the homepage, not where the video is playing)
•  Made the start drawer animation, a bit smoother
• Volume indicator rounded

v1.8:
• Added new animation, if you unsubscribe a channel.
• Added more animations on the buttons.
• The bell is yellow now.
• Fixed custom scrollbar at Join Box
• Added animation on the like and dislike button
• Centered the "Notification" text.
• Made the Blue and Red like lines bigger.
• Queue Box (redesigned)
• Changes by "Sort by" button
• "Save to" fixed transparency
• liked message better-rounded
• Outro Channel GUI (redesign) // not the thumbnails at the end, only the channel icon.
• Share input box rounded
• removed more ugly outlines.
• Hover text rounded
• At the branding Logo redesigned the Subscribe button. (The Logo on the Video not on the description)
• Rounded the Videos and information on the "i" icon.


v1.3:
• Searchbox redesigned
• More buttons redesigned
• More menus redesigned
• Added custom scrollbar
• Livechat

v1:
• Searchbox
• Search suggestions
• Buttons (rounded)
• Autoplay button
• Miniplayer (rounded)
• Video player
• Video player settings (rounded)
• Likes redesign (thumbs up: blue) (dislike: red)
• Thumbnails rounded
• Thumbnails duration
• Video settingsmenu
• Menus
